title: Jesse Itzler Once Name-Dropped Matt Damon To Coca-Cola's CEO And Even Got The Actor To Climb A Coconut Tree, Then He Landed The Deal
title_zh: 杰西·伊茨勒曾向可口可乐首席执行官提拔马特·达蒙，甚至让他爬上椰子树，然后他就达成了这笔交易
summary: Serial entrepreneur Jesse Itzler revealed how a bold move involving Matt Damon and a viral coconut-tree video helped him secure Coca-Cola's acquisition of Zico Coconut Water.
summary_zh: 连续创业者杰西·伊茨勒 (Jesse Itzler) 透露，马特·达蒙 (Matt Damon) 的大胆举动和一段火爆的椰子树视频如何帮助他确保可口可乐收购 Zico 椰子水。

title: This Super Semiconductor Company Just Struck a $6 Billion AI Deal With Meta Platforms
title_zh: 这家超级半导体公司刚刚与元平台达成了价值 60 亿美元的人工智能交易
summary: Corning typically flies under the radar, but its products are critical to the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution.
summary_zh: 康宁通常低调行事，但其产品对人工智能 (AI) 革命至关重要。

title: Heard on the Street Recap: Cutting Deals
summary: The U.S. agreed to cut tariffs on India to 18% from 50% after India agreed to stop buying Russian oil. India was subject to a 25% "reciprocal" tariff and an additional 25% for purchasing Russian oil.
summary_zh: 印度同意停止购买俄罗斯石油后，美国同意将对印度的关税从50%削减至18%。印度要缴纳25%的“互惠”关税，购买俄罗斯石油还要额外缴纳25%的关税。

title: Stock Market Today: Dow Jumps As Trump Touts This Deal; Robinhood Plunges But Palantir Pops (Live Coverage)
title_zh: 今日股市：特朗普吹捧这笔交易，道琼斯指数上涨； Robinhood 暴跌，但 Palantir 流行（现场报道）
summary: The Dow Jones and other major indexes rose. Palantir and Tesla were moving on the stock market today. A Trump move boosted some stocks.
summary_zh: 道琼斯指数和其他主要股指上涨。 Palantir 和 Tesla 今天在股市上表现出色。特朗普的举动提振了一些股票。

title: US and India reach trade deal, Astrazeneca shares move to NYSE
title_zh: 美国和印度达成贸易协议，阿斯利康股票登陆纽约证券交易所
summary: Yahoo Finance Host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the US and India reaching a new trade deal, big-box retailers Target (TGT) and Walmart (WMT) both starting the month off with new chief executives at the...
summary_zh: 雅虎财经主持人乔什·利普顿 (Josh Lipton) 在本《市场分钟》中追踪今日走势最强劲的股票和最大的市场故事，包括美国和印度达成新的贸易协议、大型零售商塔吉特 (TGT) 和沃尔玛 (WMT) 都在本月开始任命新任首席执行官。
